select e.emp_name as employeeName, w.id , w.work_days , w.attendance_days , w.absenteeism_days , w.float_performance, w.bonus, w.check_work_days, w.work_day_overtime_h, w.weekend_overtime_h, w.festival_overtime_h, w.work_day_overtime_d, w.weekend_overtime_d, w.festival_overtime_d, w.remainder_overtime_lm_h, w.month_overtime_h, w.take_hours_off, w.details , w.remainder_overtime_m_h, w.taxi_fare, w.travel_expenses, w.meals, w.telephone_bill, w.overtime_allowance, w.other_add_cost, w.other_sub_cost, w.remark , w.sub_status, w.create_time, w.pg_id, w.employee_id from ba_work_attendance w inner join ba_pg_emp pe on pe.emp_id=w.employee_id and pe.pg_id=w.pg_id inner join ba_employee e on pe.emp_id=e.id where 1=1 and pe.pg_id=#{workAttendanceCo.projectId} and w.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{workAttendanceCo.yearValue},'-',#{workAttendanceCo.monthValue},'%')
and CONCAT(w.employee_id,e.emp_name) like CONCAT('%',#{workAttendanceCo.keyword},'%')
select e.emp_name as employeeName ,w.* from ba_work_attendance w, ba_employee e where e.del_flag=#{delFlag} and w.employee_id=e.id and w.id=#{id} order by w.sub_status asc
select w.* from ba_work_attendance w, ba_employee e where e.del_flag=#{delFlag} and w.employee_id=e.id and w.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{yearValue},'-',#{monthValue},'%') order by w.sub_status asc

select e.emp_name as employeeName, a.update_status as updateStatus, b.* from ba_apply_attendance a inner join ba_work_attendance b on b.id=a.attendance_id inner join ba_employee e on b.employee_id=e.id where a.apply_id=1 and e.del_flag=#{workAttendanceCo.delFlag} and b.sub_status=#{workAttendanceCo.subStatus} order by b.sub_status asc
